attributes.action: Get MP's to stand down now...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If your an MP wishing to stand down, do it now.  Not at the next election when we will all have to pay further "windfall" payments....

rejection.details: Government does not control who sits in Parliament. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
